text: Bogusław Sochnacki (14 October 1930 - 26 July 2004) was a Polish actor. He appeared in more than 100 films and television shows between 1950 and 2003. ==Selected filmography== * Pięciu (1964) * Stawka większa niż życie (1967) * The Story of Sin (1975) * Ballada o Januszku (1988) * Burial of a Potato (1990) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1930 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Polish male film actors Category:Actors from Katowice
title: Bogusław Sochnacki
